column4: uhm, is it possible to change the resolution of Ubuntu's boot screen?
hey does anyone know if its possible to change the screen resolution of ubuntu's boot screen? 640x480 looks very ugly on an lcd!
does it make a difference? its a Boot screen, you shouldnt see it for too long.
lol, but you cant read the font. and its also the resolution on the tty (you know, Ctrl+Alt+F1)
